project.name: Documentation
project.description: Maintenance and enhancement of PPC specific documentation and website.

longdescription.p:
The documentation team is responsible for updating and creating documentation for the Gentoo/PPC team with a focus on the
Installation Guide and the
Gentoo PPC FAQ.
The Gentoo Handbook is the Gentoo/PPC "official" documentation. The PPC-specific steps have to be written and verified before each release.

milestone.description: Include instructions for installing and running Gentoo on a firewire or usb device, such as an external hard drive, usb keychain or iPod.
Expand and update Old World support sections for new and improved Old World support.
Editing and Verification of all documentation for the 2005.1 release.
Complete a hardware table for supported machines.
